short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hiro Emoji Domains - New Decade, New Domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to more immediately visit your favorite emoji sites! We will be announcing many of our partners as new features, functionalities, and applications become available. Keep an eye out for your favorite brands and companies using emoji domains across their various social media.

If you type in an emoji domain that hasn't been registered yet, we will redirect you to the registration page for that domain to make it easier for checkout.
